titles.title: Student Loan Preservation Act
To repeal pending changes in the interest rates applicable to Federal Family Education Loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/26/1998--Introduced. Student Loan Preservation Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to repeal the interest rates and related special allowances to loan holders applicable to Federal Family Education Loans, which are set to become effective July 1, 1998.
